name: Earth Mephit
speed: Walk 20 feet, Fly 20 feet, Burrow 20 feet
T0D: When the mephit dies,  it explodes in a burst of rock. Each Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 (1d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
T1D: While the mephit remains motionless,  it is indistinguishable from an ordinary pile of rocks.
A0D: Melee Weapon Attack  + 3 to hit,  reach 5 ft.,  one creature. Hit 4 (1d6  + 1) slashing damage.
A1D: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of rock and gravel. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. taking 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
innateHeaderEntry: he mephit can innately cast enlarge/reduce (self only), requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.
